column2: You have come into possession of a manuscript of Plinius the Elder's "Naturalis Historiæ", one of the largest single works to have survived from the Roman Empire, and intended to cover the entire field of ancient knowledge. Studying this historical tome could provide insights to improve your learning.
You lock yourself away with the book.

At last, you have finished your studies of Plinius the Elder's "Naturalis Historiæ". It took many nights of reading with only the light of a candle to keep you company, but you do not regret a second of it. Your learning has significantly improved.
